data: I’m Pawa, a virtual assistant who helps group admins grow their online communities.
Let's get to know each other! 🤝 What's your name❓
I have 3 power features, but I'm best known for helping measure community engagement.💪
How active is the community you manage❓
title: Choose an Option

options.action: _this.addBlock('Maybe Pawa can help drive more engagement.')

data: Let me tell you a bit more about Pawa.
Using a scientific tool called SO(V)C index I gauge the sense of commmunity in online groups.
It's as easy as sending a questionnaire link to group members through a 💬conversational bot.
They interactively fill it out and I track the results on a beautiful 📈dashboard.
title: Choose an Option

data: Pawa has another great feature I call 💌HonestyBox.
Group members can post sensitive questions anonmously giving emotional safety to shy members
I can also 📊calculate your community activity scores with data from FB Group Insights.
title: Choose an Option

data: And the best part is I work for free in an app you already use, Facebook Messenger!
Ready to get started?🚀 Connect with Facebook below 👇
